CustomField.description: This option enables Enhanced Recurring Donations. IMPORTANT: You must enable Enhanced Recurring Donations in NPSP Settings. Enabling in Custom Settings may cause data inconsistencies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This option enables Enhanced Recurring Donations. IMPORTANT: You must enable Enhanced Recurring Donations in NPSP Settings. Enabling in Custom Settings may cause data inconsistencies.
CustomField.label: Enhanced Recurring Donations
